merge_before_transcript:
chandler: (looking through the peephole again) Ross' shirt is torn.
rachel: Alright, Emma is napping... (then to Ross) what happened to your shirt?
ross: I got mugged. And they stole my pocket.
phoebe_transcript: We're just... we're trying to figure out an excuse. Hey! Ooh! How about this We can say that Monica told us 5 o'clock, not 4 o'clock. That way we're right on time! (Others start to agree but she continues) OR... or, we can plant PCP in the apartment and call the cops on her.
